name: Gay Zodiac
description:
You wake up to a text from your friend in hte middle of the night, there seems to be a party happening at the Air  Brotherhood. What will you do? Will you fix your current relationship with your boyfriend? Or will you give up and find love somewhere else?

/////

This is a game about dating Zodiac Signs. Please take this representations as a mere joke, this are just stereotypes for the sake of a Yaoi game.

Made by Pomegranate Club with much Love!
